// import { Component } from '@angular/core'; // @Component({selector:'app-projects',templateUrl:'./projects.component.html',styleUrls:['./projects.component.css']}) // export class ProjectsComponent { // projects = [ // { title: 'Portfolio Redesign', desc: 'A modern, responsive portfolio built with Angular.', link: '#' }, // { title: 'HRMS Dashboard', desc: 'Employee management and leave policies dashboard.', link: '#' } // ]; // } import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Leave Management System", description: "A complete HRMS leave management module featuring multi-policy logic, automatic accruals, and real-time leave tracking â€” powered by Angular, PHP, and MySQL.", techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], link: "https://your-demo-link.com" }; projects = [ { name: "Automatic Email & Notification System", description: "Developed a robust email/notification system for automated employee communication and alerts.", techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], link: "https://your-demo-link.com" }, { name: "Employee Dashboard Analytics", description: "Created an analytics dashboard for employee performance, attendance, and department insights.", techStack: ["Angular", "Chart.js", "REST API"], link: "https://your-demo-link.com" }, { name: "UAE Leave Policy Engine", description: "Implemented rule-based leave logic for UAE policies â€” handling fiscal years, probation, and multiple service periods.", techStack: ["AdonisJS", "Luxon", "MySQL"], link: "https://your-demo-link.com" } ]; }
